articles.title: ‘James’ wins the Pulitzer Prize for fiction - The Washington Post
articles.description: Everett’s novel was honored at the 2025 awards, along with other books in the categories of fiction, general nonfiction, memoir, poetry, history and biography.
articles.content:
Percival Everett has won the 2025 Pulitzer Prize for fiction for his 24th novel, James.
